name: Ancient Blob Scroll, Black
description: TO BE DISTRIBUTED FOR FURTHER BLOB RESEARCH.  This NFT, an edition of 30, presents a surviving photograph of one of the ancient blob scrolls, the earliest discovered instance of blobological artwork.  While rudimentary in their execution and haphazard in their documentation, these works provide the best primary data for research after the original scrolls were lost to history.  What messages from blob can you decipher? Welcome to the field of blobology.  Contact Cal Amity on twitter (@amity_cal) for inquiries and information.
